title: 2015 Gulf 12 Hours
content:
The 2015 Gulf 12 Hours was the 5th edition of the Gulf 12 Hours. The race was held at Yas Marina Circuit on 11 December 2015.[1] It was contested with GT3-spec, Porsche Cup cars, and Group CN cars.[2]

The race was won by Michal Broniszewski, Davide Rigon and Andrea Piccini in the #11 Kessel Racing Ferrari 458 Italia GT3.[3]
